title: 820-00165 A
message: this board  damages the original batteries after a while use, has already damaged 3 batteries original app store

title: 820-00165 A
message:
You need to post more information here.
What voltages do you get with "damaged" battery?
How much time did work such battery, before dies?
Exact PPBUS_G3H voltage without battery?

title: 820-00165 A
message:
What voltages do you get with "damaged" battery? which voltages only  battery bad without charger? 
How much time did work such battery?, before dies?around 1 month and bad battery comes back
Exact PPBUS_G3H voltage without battery? 8.6v

title: 820-00165 A
message:
"What voltages do you get with "damaged" battery? which voltages only  battery bad without charger?"
Both cases; battery w/ and w/o charger connected.
Also post voltage and diode mode on SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.

title: 820-00165 A
message:
with battery and charger connected PVBAT_G3H_CONN=8.18V PPBUS_G3H=8.35
only batery=PPVBAT_G3H_CONN=7.35V  PPVBAT_G3H_CONN=7.33V
only charger=PPVBAT_G3H_CONN=8.6vV
SCL=0.544 SDA=0.53 on j6950 pin 4,5 mode diode

title: 820-00165 A
message:
"PPVBAT_G3H_CONN=7.35V  PPVBAT_G3H_CONN=7.33V"
I'm not sure what you meant here.

"SCL=0.544 SDA=0.53"
Too big difference, considering you've meant 0.530 there.
This points to U7100, or SMC issue.

title: 820-00165 A
message: excume only PPVBAT_G3H_CONN=7.35V , then change u7100?

title: 820-00165 A
message:
Remove U7100 and check again SCL/SDA.
If still big difference, SMC is the last.

Let the board cools down, before measuring in diode mode.

title: 820-00165 A
message: excuse me I came back and measured like this SCL/SDA SCL=0.550 SDA=0.546 is it still a lot of difference?

title: 820-00165 A
message:
Not too big, but usually should get almost the same value.

Be sure battery connector is good; sometime I found broken pins.

title: 820-00165 A
message: a question where do you buy batteries? in ebay?some recommendation how to search?

title: 820-00165 A
message:
I never bought Apple batteries on eBay.
I repair more for other services, they chnage the batteries when needed.
I have old original "known good" batteries in stock, only for tests; not for all models, unfortunatelly.
